DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate effect low-fat milk consumption metabolic parameter biomarkers related inflammation , oxidative stress , endothelial function Korean adult metabolic syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Low Fat Milk Consumption Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize , control , parallel , dietary intervention study design . Subjects metabolic syndrome body mass index ≥23 kg/m2 randomize low-fat milk group , instruct consume 2 pack low-fat milk per day ( 200 mL twice daily ) 6 week , control group instruct maintain habitual diet . Metabolic marker evaluate baseline end study .
DOC.criteria: Subjects enrol body mass index ( BMI ) ≥23 kg/m2 meet criterion metabolic syndrome . Those allergic milk ; history digestive disorder ; medical history cardiovascular disease , include coronary artery disease , valvular heart disease , heart failure , stroke ; cancer past 5 year ; take hypoglycemic agent diabetes mellitus ; chronic disease renal failure liver cirrhosis ; hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) level ≥ 7 % exclude research . People weight change > 5 % total weight within past 3 month , start take change dose antihypertensive agent medication dyslipidemia within previous 1 month , newly diagnose dyslipidemia require drug treatment , take steroid either orally injection within previous 3 month , pregnant expect become pregnant ; regularly consume milk quantity ≥ 200 mL per day least 3 time week average also exclude .
